CARROLL EPK

"Keep your attention on Carroll because they have a formula that could easily earn them a spot as one of indie rocks top contenders" - indiemusicalbumreviews.com

- Minnesota Public Radio
More Press

"Songs from the record are already in rotation at The Current on MPR, who called them "among the freshest tracks we've heard come from the Twin Cities in a while." No arguments here. Carroll's song structures are immaculate, but that doesn't hold back subtle and powerful emotional resonance they bring. The melancholy yet bright tracks use melodies like tides, inevitable and simple yet imminently mysterious."

- City Pages
